response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but its true worth to you is even greater. We are offering it to you at a special price, reflecting the significant discount we believe you deserve given its importance to you. Our proposal is to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. This is a generous offer that aims to bridge the gap between our valuation and yours, ensuring both parties benefit from this transaction. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
